availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, resident. Maryland native. Married to Marianna B. Lester Kirby in Henderson County, Kentucky, on January 13, 1859. Student in Springfield, Ohio, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Clark County, Springfield, p. 164A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film #001944390, p. 63.
"Maurice J "Morris" Kirby (1830-1897)," Find A Grave, Memorial #26213597, accessed October 19, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/26213597.
